mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.teamId , t.name AS teamname, p.position, p.name, ou.reason, ou.createdAt FROM player p RIGHT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id LEFT OUTER JOIN outplayer ou ON ou.playerId=p.id

SELECT p.id, p.teamId , t.name AS teamname, p.position, p.name, ou.reason, ou.createdAt FROM player p RIGHT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id LEFT OUTER JOIN outplayer ou ON ou.playerId=p.id WHERE p.teamId = #{teamId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into OutPlayer( playerId, reason, createdAt) VALUES(#{playerId},#{reason},now())
